Description:
If you are seeking to work at a startup firm, funded and supported, aiming to craft awesome products; being a part of the successful stories we create, then here you are!Develop both Web projects and Backend services of Applications
Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team
Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications
Prepare and maintain all applications utilizing standard development tools
REST API design
Utilize backend data services and contribute to increasing existing data services API
Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from the concept stage to delivery and post-launch support
Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues
Document the development process, architecture, and standard components
Coordinate with co-developers and keeps project manager well informed of the status of development effort and serve as liaison between development staff and project manager
Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development.Skills
Skills:
Previous working experience as a PHP / Laravel developer for a minimum 4 years
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, MIS or similar relevant field
In depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP and Laravel 5 PHP Framework
Hands on experience with SQL schema design, SOLID principles, REST API design 
Software testing (PHPUnit, PHPSpec, Behat…)
MySQL profiling and query optimization
Creative and efficient problem solver
Experience with JSON Encoding/Decoding
Knowledge of a version control system, preferably SVN and GIT is a plus
Knowledge of Mobile development is a big plus
Good knowledge of CMS like Drupal and WordPress
Experience with Test Driven Development (TDD)
بجانب المعلومات الأساسية، لا تنس تزويدنا بما يلي:
- تفصيل بالمهارات والأدوات التي تتقنها (نقرأ جميع ما تذكره بعناية شديدة)
- سابقة الأعمال والمشاريع التي عملت عليها ودورك فيها
- التاريخ الذي تكون جاهزا فيه لمباشرة العمل
